trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered set of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> elements that identify an item of content.
<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elements defined within a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> provides a structured means to refer to an external data item.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref> class.
Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
This <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A> method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
For convenience, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A> shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more details, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is `true.`

When copying dependency properties, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.Clone%2A> copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.
A modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
Always returns `null`.
See [Annotations Schema](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md) for schema details.
<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup.GetSchema%2A> is provided to fulfill the contract of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
Always `null`.
See [Annotations Schema](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md) for schema details.
Gets the collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> elements that make up this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> collection returned will never be `null`.
If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> contains no <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> objects, the returned collection will contain zero elements.
The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"></xref> elements that make up this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
Deserializes the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref> from a specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>.
The XML reader to use to deserialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
reader is `null`.
The serialized XML for the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref> is not valid.
Serializes the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref> to a specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.
The XML writer to use to serialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"></xref>.
writer is `null`.
